stench.name: stench
stench.effect: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.

drizzle.name: drizzle
drizzle.effect: Summons rain that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

speed-boost.name: speed-boost
speed-boost.effect: Raises Speed one stage after each turn.

sturdy.name: sturdy
sturdy.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

damp.name: damp
damp.effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

sand-veil.name: sand-veil
sand-veil.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

static.name: static
static.effect: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.

volt-absorb.name: volt-absorb
volt-absorb.effect: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

water-absorb.name: water-absorb
water-absorb.effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

oblivious.name: oblivious
oblivious.effect: Prevents infatuation and protects against captivate.

cloud-nine.name: cloud-nine
cloud-nine.effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

color-change.name: color-change
color-change.effect: Changes type to match when hit by a damaging move.

flash-fire.name: flash-fire
flash-fire.effect: Protects against fire moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

shield-dust.name: shield-dust
shield-dust.effect: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.

suction-cups.name: suction-cups
suction-cups.effect: Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.

intimidate.name: intimidate
intimidate.effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

shadow-tag.name: shadow-tag
shadow-tag.effect: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.

rough-skin.name: rough-skin
rough-skin.effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

wonder-guard.name: wonder-guard
wonder-guard.effect: Protects against damaging moves that are not super effective.

effect-spore.name: effect-spore
effect-spore.effect: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.

synchronize.name: synchronize
synchronize.effect: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.

clear-body.name: clear-body
clear-body.effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

natural-cure.name: natural-cure
natural-cure.effect: Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.

lightning-rod.name: lightning-rod
lightning-rod.effect: Redirects single-target electric moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Electric moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

serene-grace.name: serene-grace
serene-grace.effect: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

trace.name: trace
trace.effect: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.

poison-point.name: poison-point
poison-point.effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.

magnet-pull.name: magnet-pull
magnet-pull.effect: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.

rain-dish.name: rain-dish
rain-dish.effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.

sand-stream.name: sand-stream
sand-stream.effect: Summons a sandstorm that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

pressure.name: pressure
pressure.effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

thick-fat.name: thick-fat
thick-fat.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

early-bird.name: early-bird
early-bird.effect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

flame-body.name: flame-body
flame-body.effect: Has a 30% chance of burning attacking Pokémon on contact.

run-away.name: run-away
run-away.effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

hyper-cutter.name: hyper-cutter
hyper-cutter.effect: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.

pickup.name: pickup
pickup.effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

hustle.name: hustle
hustle.effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.

cute-charm.name: cute-charm
cute-charm.effect: Has a 30% chance of infatuating attacking Pokémon on contact.

plus.name: plus
plus.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

minus.name: minus
minus.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

forecast.name: forecast
forecast.effect: Changes castform's type and form to match the weather.

sticky-hold.name: sticky-hold
sticky-hold.effect: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokémon.

shed-skin.name: shed-skin
shed-skin.effect: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.

guts.name: guts
guts.effect: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

marvel-scale.name: marvel-scale
marvel-scale.effect: Increases Defense to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

liquid-ooze.name: liquid-ooze
liquid-ooze.effect: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.

overgrow.name: overgrow
overgrow.effect: Strengthens grass moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

blaze.name: blaze
blaze.effect: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

torrent.name: torrent
torrent.effect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

swarm.name: swarm
swarm.effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

drought.name: drought
drought.effect: Summons strong sunlight that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

arena-trap.name: arena-trap
arena-trap.effect: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.  Eluded by flying-types and Pokémon in the air.

white-smoke.name: white-smoke
white-smoke.effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

air-lock.name: air-lock
air-lock.effect: Negates all effects of weather, but does not prevent the weather itself.

motor-drive.name: motor-drive
motor-drive.effect: Absorbs electric moves, raising Speed one stage.

rivalry.name: rivalry
rivalry.effect: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.

steadfast.name: steadfast
steadfast.effect: Raises Speed one stage upon flinching.

snow-cloak.name: snow-cloak
snow-cloak.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

gluttony.name: gluttony
gluttony.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

anger-point.name: anger-point
anger-point.effect: Raises Attack to the maximum of six stages upon receiving a critical hit.

unburden.name: unburden
unburden.effect: Doubles Speed upon using or losing a held item.

heatproof.name: heatproof
heatproof.effect: Halves damage from fire moves and burns.

simple.name: simple
simple.effect: Doubles the Pokémon's stat modifiers.  These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.

dry-skin.name: dry-skin
dry-skin.effect: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain.  Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25×, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

download.name: download
download.effect: Raises the attack stat corresponding to the opponents' weaker defense one stage upon entering battle.

iron-fist.name: iron-fist
iron-fist.effect: Strengthens punch-based moves to 1.2× their power.

poison-heal.name: poison-heal
poison-heal.effect: Heals for 1/8 max HP after each turn when poisoned in place of damage.

adaptability.name: adaptability
adaptability.effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.

skill-link.name: skill-link
skill-link.effect: Extends two-to-five-hit moves and triple kick to their full length every time.

hydration.name: hydration
hydration.effect: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

solar-power.name: solar-power
solar-power.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× but costs 1/8 max HP after each turn during strong sunlight.

quick-feet.name: quick-feet
quick-feet.effect: Increases Speed to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

normalize.name: normalize
normalize.effect: Makes the Pokémon's moves all act normal-type.

sniper.name: sniper
sniper.effect: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.

magic-guard.name: magic-guard
magic-guard.effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

no-guard.name: no-guard
no-guard.effect: Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon hit.

stall.name: stall
stall.effect: Makes the Pokémon move last within its move's priority bracket.

technician.name: technician
technician.effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

leaf-guard.name: leaf-guard
leaf-guard.effect: Protects against major status ailments during strong sunlight.

klutz.name: klutz
klutz.effect: Prevents the Pokémon from using its held item in battle.

mold-breaker.name: mold-breaker
mold-breaker.effect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.

super-luck.name: super-luck
super-luck.effect: Raises moves' critical hit rates one stage.

aftermath.name: aftermath
aftermath.effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

anticipation.name: anticipation
anticipation.effect: Notifies all trainers upon entering battle if an opponent has a super-effective move, self destruct, explosion, or a one-hit KO move.

forewarn.name: forewarn
forewarn.effect: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.

unaware.name: unaware
unaware.effect: Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.

tinted-lens.name: tinted-lens
tinted-lens.effect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.

filter.name: filter
filter.effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

slow-start.name: slow-start
slow-start.effect: Halves Attack and Speed for five turns upon entering battle.

scrappy.name: scrappy
scrappy.effect: Lets the Pokémon's normal and fighting moves hit ghost Pokémon.

storm-drain.name: storm-drain
storm-drain.effect: Redirects single-target water moves to this Pokémon where possible.  Absorbs Water moves, raising Special Attack one stage.

ice-body.name: ice-body
ice-body.effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

solid-rock.name: solid-rock
solid-rock.effect: Decreases damage taken from super-effective moves by 1/4.

snow-warning.name: snow-warning
snow-warning.effect: Summons hail that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

honey-gather.name: honey-gather
honey-gather.effect: The Pokémon may pick up honey after battle.

frisk.name: frisk
frisk.effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

reckless.name: reckless
reckless.effect: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2× their power.

multitype.name: multitype
multitype.effect: Changes arceus's type and form to match its held Plate.

flower-gift.name: flower-gift
flower-gift.effect: Increases friendly Pokémon's Attack and Special Defense to 1.5× during strong sunlight.

bad-dreams.name: bad-dreams
bad-dreams.effect: Damages sleeping opponents for 1/8 their max HP after each turn.

pickpocket.name: pickpocket
pickpocket.effect: Steals attacking Pokémon's held items on contact.

sheer-force.name: sheer-force
sheer-force.effect: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects.

unnerve.name: unnerve
unnerve.effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

defiant.name: defiant
defiant.effect: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.

defeatist.name: defeatist
defeatist.effect: Halves Attack and Special Attack at 50% max HP or less.

cursed-body.name: cursed-body
cursed-body.effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.

healer.name: healer
healer.effect: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.

friend-guard.name: friend-guard
friend-guard.effect: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.

weak-armor.name: weak-armor
weak-armor.effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

multiscale.name: multiscale
multiscale.effect: Halves damage taken from full HP.

flare-boost.name: flare-boost
flare-boost.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when burned.

harvest.name: harvest
harvest.effect: Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokémon has held no items in the meantime.

telepathy.name: telepathy
telepathy.effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.

moody.name: moody
moody.effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.

poison-touch.name: poison-touch
poison-touch.effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning target Pokémon upon contact.

regenerator.name: regenerator
regenerator.effect: Heals for 1/3 max HP upon switching out.

sand-rush.name: sand-rush
sand-rush.effect: Doubles Speed during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

wonder-skin.name: wonder-skin
wonder-skin.effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

analytic.name: analytic
analytic.effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.

illusion.name: illusion
illusion.effect: Takes the appearance of the last conscious party Pokémon upon being sent out until hit by a damaging move.

infiltrator.name: infiltrator
infiltrator.effect: Bypasses light screen, reflect, and safeguard.

mummy.name: mummy
mummy.effect: Changes attacking Pokémon's abilities to Mummy on contact.

moxie.name: moxie
moxie.effect: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.

justified.name: justified
justified.effect: Raises Attack one stage upon taking damage from a dark move.

rattled.name: rattled
rattled.effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.

magic-bounce.name: magic-bounce
magic-bounce.effect: Reflects most non-damaging moves back at their user.

sap-sipper.name: sap-sipper
sap-sipper.effect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.

prankster.name: prankster
prankster.effect: Raises non-damaging moves' priority by one stage.

sand-force.name: sand-force
sand-force.effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

iron-barbs.name: iron-barbs
iron-barbs.effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

zen-mode.name: zen-mode
zen-mode.effect: Changes darmanitan's form after each turn depending on its HP: Zen Mode below 50% max HP, and Standard Mode otherwise.

victory-star.name: victory-star
victory-star.effect: Increases moves' accuracy to 1.1× for friendly Pokémon.

turboblaze.name: turboblaze
turboblaze.effect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.

teravolt.name: teravolt
teravolt.effect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent moves.
